item.title: District Legal Services Authority Conducts Surprise Inspection at Government School and College Hostels in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Under the supervision of the District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), a surprise inspection was carried out at Telangana Welfare School and College in Veerapuram village, Gadwal town, and the Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalaya (KGBV) in Erravalli village, Itikyala mandal on Wednesday.
During the inspection, Legal Aid Counsels interacted with the teachers and students to understand the problems and challenges faced in the hostels and educational institutions. They inquired about the facil...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy Unveils Rs 316 Crore Development Package for Roads and Healthcare Infrastructure
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a significant push toward the comprehensive development of Gadwal constituency, local MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy announced the sanction of â‚¹316.45 crore for major road development projects under the Roads & Buildings (R&B) and Panchayat Raj departments. The announcement was made during a press conference held at his camp office in Gadwal on Tuesday.
Speaking on the occasion, the MLA said he was committed to the all-round progress of Gadwal and would go to any length to uphold the...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
